alert.note: Alert for Jones; Lenoir; Northern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 3:42PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Jones, southeastern Greene, Lenoir, northwestern Craven and central Pitt Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 342 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lizzie to near Pleasant Hill. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Kinston, Winterville, Ayden, Grifton, Phillips Crossroads, Snow Hill, Bell Arthur, Deep Run, House, Dawson, Graingers, Maury, Ormondsville, Pleasant Hill, Roundtree, Wyse Fork, Lizzie, Pitt Greenville Airport and Dowdy Ficklen Stadium. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
